mapper.select: select jod.order_code as orderCode,jpo.out_trade_no as outTradeNo,jod.open_id as openId from jl_prepay_order jpo inner join jl_order_detail jod on jpo.order_code =jod.order_code where jod.order_status ='07'

select jod.order_code as orderCode,jpo.out_trade_no as outTradeNo,jod.open_id as openId from jl_prepay_order jpo inner join jl_order_detail jod on jpo.order_code =jod.order_code where NOW()> date_add(jod.create_date, interval 5 minute) and jod.order_status ='07'
